attributes.action: 'STOP' the council turning Whitworth Quarry into a Waste Landfill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop Lancashire County Council turning Whitworth Quarry into a Waste Landfill site

rejection.details: Please contact your local authority directly in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
